*** 418,16 ***
  usprep_close(UStringPrepProfile* profile){
      if(profile==NULL){
          return;
      }
  
!     umtx_lock(&usprepMutex);
      /* decrement the ref count*/
      if(profile->refCount > 0){
          profile->refCount--;
      }
!     umtx_unlock(&usprepMutex);
  
  }
